Package org.smooks.engine.delivery.sax.ng.org.apache.xerces.xni.parser

Interface XMLDocumentFilter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    XMLDocumentHandler, XMLDocumentSource
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RevalidationHandler, XMLDTDValidatorFilter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    XIncludeHandler, XML11DTDValidator, XML11NamespaceBinder, XML11NSDTDValidator, XMLDTDValidator, XMLNamespaceBinder, XMLNSDTDValidator, XMLSchemaValidator, XPointerHandler
    public interface XMLDocumentFilter
extends XMLDocumentHandler, XMLDocumentSource
    Defines a document filter that acts as both a receiver and an emitter of document events.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Andy Clark, IBM
